data.eml:eml: Four new genera and five new species of ‘ Heterocypris’ from Western Australia (Crustacea, Ostracoda, Cyprinotinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Halse, Stuart A., Martens, Koen (2019): Four new genera and five new species of ‘ Heterocypris’ from Western Australia (Crustacea, Ostracoda, Cyprinotinae). European Journal of Taxonomy 493: 1-35, DOI: https://doi.org/10.5852/ejt.2019.493
